tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE follow_up_emails (
  email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  email_subject VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  email_body TEXT NOT NULL,
  send_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE email_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    email_sent_at TIMESTAMP,
    email_opened BOOLEAN,
    email_clicked BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE customer_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    action_type ENUM('click', 'open', 'unsubscribe') NOT NULL,
    action_date DATETIME NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email_address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_behavior (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
    behavior_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE email_templates (
    template_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    template_name VARCHAR(50),
    email_subject VARCHAR(100),
    email_body TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE email_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_id INT REFERENCES email_templates(template_id),
    recipient_email VARCHAR(100),
    sent_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
